## Solution using regular expression with look ahead

#### Part 1
    
    ================================================================================
    Captcha:                1122
    Regex pattern:          (\d{1})(?=\1)
    Highlight digit pairs:  1122
    Digit pairs:            12
    Sum of digits:          3
